name: Paper Golem
description: The Paper Golem is a tiny construct, resembling an ordinary sheet of paper when motionless. Its high dexterity gives it an agile form, enabling it to dodge attacks effectively.
memorable: Its ability to blend in as paper and its immunity to form-altering magic make it a unique and tricky opponent.
goals: Typically serves as a guardian or a trickster in various encounters.
relations: May serve creators or be associated with constructs and magical beings.
environment: Often found in libraries, basements, or any areas filled with paper and writing materials.
strengths: High dexterity allows it to evade attacks; immune to being affected by spells that alter its form.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to fire damage, which can easily exploit its defenses.
attacks: Primary attack is Paper Cut, dealing 6 slashing damage with a +5 to hit.
most_powerful_ability: Ink Blot can deal poison damage on a successful attack, adding an element of strategy to its combat.
senses: The Paper Golem has passive perception of 8, indicating poor awareness.
additional_information: Immunity to poison and psychic damage.
Condition immunities include charmed, exhausted, frightened, and poisoned.
Can remain motionless and disguise itself as ordinary paper.
Attack is considered magical for the purpose of overcoming resistance.
Low intelligence means it cannot strategize effectively.
test_queries: whimsical construct that blends in with paper
agile paper golem immune to fire
trickster golem with a deadly ink attack
